body:
* add a variant allowing catch2 to be installed
via CMake, which is useful for generating a .cmake
config file for consumption by other projects

This allows me to "just consume" the .cmake config files generated after:

 `spack install catch2+use_cmake % gcc@7.4.0`
`spack load catch2`

I'm sure `spack` devs will want to make changes to this draft approach. I'll do what I can or feel free to push to the branch.
title: ENH: add catch2 CMake install
